name: Liuzhi Xinhua Coal Mine
company_mentions: 贵州天润矿业有限公司 (Guizhou Tianrun Mining Co., Ltd.)

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. The Liuzhi Xinhua Coal Mine is an underground coal mine with a designed production capacity of 1.2 million tons per year

operators: 贵州天润矿业有限公司 (Guizhou Tianrun Mining Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Guizhou Tianrun Mining Co., Ltd. and owned by China Resources Power Holdings Limited.
